tool_description: Get bet predictions of Betfair Exchange Sports and Markets with applied advanced Machine Learning.
name: Betfair Exchange Predictions
title: Betfair Exchange Predictions

api_list.name: Get Sports
api_list.description: Get Sports IDs and use it in Get Event (as sportid parameter).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betfair-exchange-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betfair-exchange-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://betfair-exchange-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betfair-exchange-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Predictions
api_list.description: Get markets predictions on specific event.

api_list.name: Get Event
api_list.description: Find a Match on Betfair Exchange and retrieve Event ID (use it to get Predictions).
